Es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de materia prima como cuadernos, lapiceros, hojas, borradores, crayones, entre otros productos.
texts.en: Danelia Justina is 60 years old and she has supported herself through her book store for more than 5 years. She begins her work every morning with great happiness, working from 7:00 am until 9:00 pm. The majority of her customers know this business very well. That's why she is requesting this loan, intended for the purchase of merchandise such as notebooks, pencils, paper, erasers, and crayons, among other products.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, pencils, paper, erasers, and crayons, among other products to sell.

loans.name: Tam's Group

texts.en:
Tam is 57 years old with 3 children who are married. Now she is living with her youngest son in Anninh village. She has a small shop that sells artificial  paper things for the dead. It is a very traditional business in Vietnam and also creates very good income for those who are both making and selling. Every month, she gets about 4,000,000 VND of profit from this business. 

Joining with our credit program in 2008, she has used loans very effectively in expanding her business and also repaid on time. She sees that this kind of credit is very suitable with her business. For her new loan cycle, she wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy more materials.

 Phuong is 28 years old. She is managing a wood workshop that makes family furniture. She hopes to get a loan of 7,392,000 VND to buy wood as material.

loans.use: to buy more materials to make artificial paper things for the dead.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
Ronald es un joven soñador de 22 años. Es soltero y vive en la casa de sus padres. Desde pequeño ayuda a su padre en la agricultura, actividad que le gusta y considera que será su principal sustento para el futuro, ya que sólo pudo cursar la educación primaria, “me gusta trabajar en la tierra, siento que ahí puedo desempeñarme mejor que en cualquier otro oficio”, acota Ronald. Félix, su padre le heredó su sabiduría y sabe como desenvolverse. Aprendió cuando regar, cuando abonar, predecir el tiempo y así cuidar sus cultivos para obtener cosechas gratificantes.
Ahora el cuenta con parcelas propias donde siembra papas y arvejas. De las cosechas obtuvo un buen ingreso, dinero que ahorra para seguir invirtiendo en sus cultivos. “Después de juntar el dinero necesario, tengo planeado hacer mi casa propia en los terrenos que mi papá me heredó y tener una familia”, comenta con una sonrisa dibujada. Éste será su préstamo número 8 de MPF. Por lo tanto, él espera de su ayuda para lograr sus metas. Ronald está contento con su banco comunal, sabe que entre familiares y amigos el camino será más fácil de seguir. Con el crédito, comprará 6 bolsas de abonos.
texts.en:
Ronald, 22, is a young dreamer.  He is single and lives in his parents' house.  Since he was little he has helped his father in agriculture, work he enjoys and considers to be his principal support for the future, since he was only able to finish elementary school.

"I enjoy working with the land.  I feel that there I can perform better than in any other job," he says.  He learned when to irrigate, when to fertilize, to predict the weather and so to take care of his crops to get gratifying harvests.  Now he has his own plots where he grows potatoes and peas.  

From the harvests he had a good income, money he's saving to continue investing in his crops.  "After I get together the necessary money, I plan to build my own house on the property my father left for me, and have a family," he comments, a smile appearing.

This will be his eighth loan from MPF, so he hopes it helps him achieve his goals.  Ronald is happy with his communal bank.  He knows that among family and friends the road will be much easier to follow.

With the loan he will buy six bags of fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy six bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es: Andrés, tiene la edad 27 de años, está casado y vive con su esposa actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar los fertilizantes para la asistencia de su cultivo. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación de este cultivo y con la plantación en condiciones regulares por lo cual pretende asistirla para así mejorarla en óptimas condiciones. El quiere implementar muevas mejoras en su cafetal para así obtener el máximo de las ganancias en producción de cosecha como la calidad de grano cosechado. El pretende con el crédito o tiene como meta generar las ganancias máximas para salir adelante con el crédito y mejorar su bienestar económico cada dia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Andrés is 27 years old.  He is married and currently lives with his wife.  With this loan, he plans to purchase fertilizers to help his crop.  Andrés has a plot of land suitable for cultivating his crop.  The field is in adequate condition, but Andrés plans to help it along and bring it up to top-quality condition.  He wants to implement new improvements in his coffee crop in order to obtain maximum profits in his harvest output and in the quality of the harvested bean.  As a goal, he plans to use the loan to generate maximum profits to get himself ahead and to improve his financial well-being each day.  This is Andrés's first loan with FUDECOSUR.  He has never taken out a loan from a state bank before, but FUDECOSUR offered him the loan with better terms and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: with assistance for his coffee crop.

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Victor Enrique

texts.es: Víctor tiene 27 años es casado y tiene dos hijos años. El se dedica a la venta y elaboración de losetas cruces de cemento. Víctor se describe como una persona de buenos sentimientos que le gusta ayudar a las personas el crédito que solicita es para la compra de cemento, palas, entre otras herramientas. Su sueño es poder sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en: Víctor is 27 years old, married and has two children.  He makes his living making and selling cover slabs for graves and cement crosses.  Víctor describes himself as a caring person who likes to help people.  The loan he is requesting is for the purchase of cement, shovels and other tools.  His dream is to help his children to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase cement, shovels and other tools.

loans.name: Gloria Narcisa

texts.es:
Gloria tiene 32 años, es casada y tiene tres hijos que tienen 12, 10 y 2 años de edad. Vive con su familia en Latacunga en la Sierra Centro de Ecuador. Gloria se describe como una persona trabajadora, alegre y cariñosa con sus hijos.

Gloria trabaja sola en la venta de productos de alinio para comida, ella trabaja en las calles como vendedor ambulante. Es el primer crédito que le solicita a Fodemi, el mismo que será invertido en la compra de productos como canela, aliños y condimentos para comida; inversión que será de mucha ayuda para Gloria ya que podrá seguir aumentando sus productos y lograr tener buenas ventas y buenos ingresos lo cual ayudará para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de los suyos.

Su sueño es poder tener un local donde pueda adecuar una tiendita y seguir creciendo como comerciante ya que las calles son muy peligrosas, pero tiene que trabajar por el bienestar de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gloria is 32 years old.  She is married and has three children who are 12, 10 and 2 years old.  She lives with her family in Latacunga, Sierra Centro, Ecuador.  Gloria describes herself as a hard-working and happy person who is loving with her children.

Gloria works alone selling spices for food.  She works as a street vendor.  This is the first loan she has requested from Fodemi, and it will be invested in the purchase of products like cinnamon, spices and seasonings for food.  The investment will be a great help to Gloria since it will allow her to increase her inventory and to have bigger sales and better income.  This will help to improve her quality of life and that of her loved ones.

Gloria's dream is to have a space to open a small store and continue to grow as a store keeper.  The streets are very dangerous but she has to work for the well-being of her children.

loans.use: to purchase products like cinnamon, spices and seasonings for food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and sew clothing for resale.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix de 43 años de edad, está casado hace 19 años con Nancy. Ambos vieron nacer 7 hijos de los cuales solo viven con él 3, siendo su hija menor de 3 años. Toda ésta familia habita en una casa rústica de su propiedad. Sus padres le enseñaron las labores del campo, actividad que también sustenta a su numerosa familia. Él cuenta con terrenos agrícolas que la comunidad de Punray le otorga, en esas parcelas siembra papas de distintas variedades, arvejas, habas y verduras, tales como: zanahorias, lechugas, coles, entre otras. Considera que es más rentable sembrar arvejas y papas, por la demanda que tienen en la ciudad y para llevarlas a la ciudad de Lima para el consumo masivo. El principal problema que él señala es la baja y alza de precios. “Hay  meses en que el precio baja y simplemente se recupera el capital, pero aún así seguimos”, agrega. Mas adelante, Félix quisiera comprarse un auto para hacer servicio de transporte de su comunidad hasta la ciudad de Tarma, ya que con el tiempo sus fuerzas no serán las mismas para arar la tierra. Así mismo anhela ver a sus pequeños hijos formarse para el futuro, para ello él seguirá trabajando igual o más que ahora. Con éste serían 8 préstamos de MFP, y 8 veces que trabaja coordinadamente con su banco comunal llamado “Nueva Jerusalén”, del que se siente satisfecho por los logros e intereses en común. Con la ayuda de ustedes, él podrá comprar abonos para enriquecer sus tierras y así sembrar arvejas para ésta nueva temporada.
texts.en:
Felix is 43 years old, and has been married to Nancy for 19 years. They have 7 children of which only 3 live with them, the youngest daughter being under  3 years old. The whole family lives in a cottage of their own. 

Felix's parents taught him farm work, an activity that also supports his large family. He has agricultural land that the Punray community grants.  In the parcels he plants different varieties of potatoes, peas, beans and vegetables such as carrots, lettuce, cabbage, among others.  He considers it more profitable to plant peas and potatoes, which have demand in the city and he brings them to the city of Lima for mass consumption. 

The main problem he points out are the low and high prices. "There are months when the price falls and I only recover capital, but yet we go on," he adds. Later, Felix wanted to buy a car to establish a transport service in their community to the city of Tarma.  Over time his efforts will not be the same for plowing. Felix also longs to see his little children grow up, and for that he will continue to work even more than now. 

This loan would be his 8th loan with MFP.  It's been 8 times that he has been working closely with his ​​communal bank, "New Jerusalem," with which he is satisfied by the achievements and common interests. With your help, Felix can buy fertilizers to enrich his land and thus sow peas for this new season.

loans.use: To buy bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Duo Guiados Por Dios Group

texts.es: Duo Guiado por Dio. Este duo esta integrado por doña Brenda de 20 años,ella se dedica a la venta de ropa variada para dama,caballero y niño.desde hace 1 años ella nos cuenta que en tan poco tiempo ella a visto un crecimiento en su negocio, y se siente muy contenta, y por eso se dirije a fape y Kiva solicitando apoyo para compra de ropa nueva variada, y nuevos diceños, al igual que la siguiente socia tambien se dedica al negocio de venta de productos de concumo diariom,y por la misma razon esta solicitando este credito,el sueño de ellas es tener un local mas grande y tener variedades como estilo en ropa para la venta.
texts.en:
One member of Duo Guiado por Dio is Brenda, 20, who sells clothing for men, women and children. She has been doing this for one year and tells us that in such a short time she has seen growth in her business and is very happy. For that reason she came to Kiva asking for support to buy new assorted clothing and new designs. 

Her loan partner sells basic goods and is asking for a loan to buy new merchandise. Their dreams are to have a larger store and to have greater varieties of clothing styles to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Association Dental 7 Group

texts.fr: L'association "Dental 7" est un groupe composé de trois femmes mariées et de deux jeunes célibataires dont l'une est le chef du groupe.Elles exercent toutes dans le commerce d'articles de mercerie et de tissus.Les trois vendent sur des tables devant leurs domiciles alors que les deux autres se déplacent pour placer leurs marchandises à domicile et récuperer leurs argent au bout de deux mois.L'essentiel de leurs besoins sont pris en charge avec les revenus de cette activité. Le chef du groupe ( qui tient le papier) a arrété assez tot ses études et s'est engagée dans le commerce. Elle subvient tant bien que mal à ses propres besoins et à ceux alimentaires, sanitaires et vestimentaires de ses frères et soeurs ainsi que de sa maman. Pour augmenter leur fonds de commerce et profiter de la forte demande en cette période de fete,l'association sollicite un pret de 250 000f pour acheter des tissus et des articles de mercerie.Leur ambition est d'élargir leurs activités.
texts.en: The Dental 7 Group is made up of three married women and two younger single women, of whom one is the group leader.  She works full-time selling small notions and fabric. The three sell from small tables outside their homes while the other two move their merchandise within their homes and recover their money by the end of two months.  The profits from these small businesses cover their basic needs.  The leader of the group (who is holding the paper) stopped her studies early and began working.  Through her business, she is somehow able to provide for herself and for the food, health, and clothing needs of her brothers, sisters, and mother.  In order to grow their capital and profit from high demand in this holiday season, the group is asking for a 250,000f loan to purchase fabrics and small items.  Their goal is to expand their business.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and small notions.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es una persona responsable y muy trabajadora, tiene esposa y 4 hijos con los que vive en Latacunga que se encuentra en la sierra centro de Ecuador. 

Trabaja en la crianza de cerdos y en la agricultura, empezó a trabajar desde que ra niño ya que sus padres le enseñaron a ser responsable desde pequeño. Con el crédito que Fodemi le ha ayudado va a invertir conprando crías de cerdo para poder criarlos y engordarlos para posteriormente sacarlos a la venta. Inversión que a un futuro le generará ganancias y muy buenos ingresos, estos le ayudarán para la compra de medicina ya que se encuentra un poco mal de salud.

Anhela llegar a tener unas chancheras para no tener a sus animales sueltos ya que le pueden robar,  y así incrementar el número de animales para poder obtener buenos ingresos y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is a responsible and very hardworking person.  He has a wife and 4 children with whom he lives in Latacunga, Sierra Centro, Ecuador. 

Juan works in raising pigs and in agriculture.  He began working as a child, as his parents taught him to be responsible from a young age.  With the loan from Fodemi, Juan has been able to invest in the purchase of litters of pigs which he will raise, fatten and later sell.   This is an investment that in the future will generate a profit for him and very good earnings, which will help him to purchase medicine, as his health is somewhat poor.

He hopes to one day have some pens for his pigs so they aren't running loose and more apt to be stolen.  He also hopes to increase the number of animals he has so he can earn more and thereby improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a litter of pigs to fatten and sell.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
A sus 64 años de edad, Isabel es una emprendedora consagrada a su negocio, desde muy joven se ha dedicado  al trabajo de la confección, actualmente trabaja desde su casa elaborando prendas por encargo a vecinos, amigos, familiares y otros clientes externos. 

Pese a que constantemente se enfrenta al desafió de la industrialización y ya la mayoría de las personas prefieren comprar los últimos diseños en vez de mandarlos a confeccionar, esta luchadora incansable espera tener cada vez más clientes y mejorar sus posibilidades económicas para crecer su negocio, y generar empleos a mas personas que lo necesiten.

Actualmente Isabel necesita un préstamo para comprar los insumos necesarios para aumentar su producción y así incrementar su capacidad de comercialización, conseguir mas clientes y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Isabel, 64, is an entrepreneur known for her dressmaking business.  Since she was very young she has been dedicated to it.  She currently works from her house making clothing to order for neighbors, friends, relatives, and other customers.

She confronts the challenge of industrialzation and  the majority of people preferring to buy the latest designs instead of ordering them to be made. She is battling tirelessly to have more customers and improve her economic situation so that she can grow her business and generate work for more people who need it.

Isabel needs a loan to buy supplies so that she can increase production and thus be able to sell more, attract more customers and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy supplies to increase production

loans.name: Emilly

texts.en:
Emilly is a mother of two young children and has been in mixed farming for 4 years. Her farm currently produces milk and vegetables for the local market in her home area of Kitale in Western Kenya.

Emilly has requested a loan of 36,400 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase and insure a dairy cow. She says the purchase of a dairy cow will improve her income and enable her to provide milk for family consumption as well as improve her market sales to provide for the expansion of the business and improve the family's living standards. She plans to own 5 dairy cows in the next five years.

She notes the challenge of diseases as quite significant, especially to dairy farmers. She reiterates she will repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: To purchase and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Miryam Susana

texts.es:
Miryam es una persona muy honesta, sincera, responsable con sus hijos y sobre todo le gusta trabajar para salir adelante junto con sus hijos. Es casada, tiene 5 hijos a quien mantener. Vive con su familia en Latacunga.

Miryam trabaja junto con su esposo en la gricultura, específicamente en la crianza y venta de cerdos. Con este segundo crédito que solicitóa  Fodemi va a comprar balanceado para la alimentación de sus animales y también tiene la necesidad de empezar a construir una chanchera para sus animales. Con esta inversión que realiza sus animales podrán tener la calidad que los demandantes requieren para poder coomprarlos y así Miryam recuperará su capital y podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos.

El sueño que tiene Miryam es poder seguir dandoles el estudio a sus hijos ya que desea que sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Miryam is a very honest, sincere, and responsible person with her children.  Above all she enjoys working to get ahead together with her children.  She is married and has five children to support.  She lives with her family in Latacunga.

Miryam works with her husband in agriculture, specifically raising and selling pigs.  With this second loan that she requested from FODEMI, she's going to buy balanced feed to feed her animals.  She also needs to begin building a pigpen for her animals.  With this loan that she's getting, her animals will be able to be of the quality that customers require to be able to buy them.  In this way Miryam will be able to get back her capital and improve her children's quality of life.

Miryam's dream is to be able to continue giving her children an education, since she wants them to be good professionals.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to feed her pigs and to build a pigpen.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is a resident and a farmer in Kitale, Western Kenya. She is aged 29 and has been in farming for over 3 years, producing and selling maize, beans and vegetables to the local market. She is married with two children aged 12 and 3 years.

Mercy has requested loan of 31,200 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase and insure a dairy cow. She says that her business has been the only source of income for the family, and she will be focusing on buying more dairy cows in order to enjoy the economies of scale. She adds that this is her second loan with Juhudi Kilimo and it will definitely make better returns.

Mercy says the problem of managing dairy diseases is a great challenge.

loans.use: To purchase and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Mi Dios Es Mi Fortaleza Group

texts.es: El banco comunal Mi Dios Es Mi Fortaleza, Está conformado por Neuda, Matilde, Natividad, Thelma, Basilisa, Ventura, María y Silvia. Ellas son personas muy responsables y disfrutan de tener este medio de vida. Neuda se dedica a la venta y compra de artesanías, desde hace más de 7 años que tiene este negocio, ella tiene 2 hijos menores de edad bajo su cargo. Su mama fue quien le enseño este negocio ha sido difícil pues las ventas han disminuido, pero aun así ella ha salido adelante. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de pinceles, pintura, jarrones, barro, entre otros.
texts.en:
The “Mi Dios Es Mi Fortaleza” (My God Is My Fortress) communal bank’s members are Neuda, Matilde, Natividad, Thelma, Basilisa, Ventura, María and Silvia.  They are very responsible people who enjoy their line of work.

Neuda is a crafts merchant.  She’s had this business for more than 7 years.  She has two minor children in her care.  Her mother taught her this business which has been difficult because sales have dropped.  However, she has continued to get ahead despite that.  The reason for the loan is to buy paint brushes, paint, jugs and clay, among others.

loans.use: to buy paint brushes, paint, jugs and clay, among others.

loans.name: Raymond

texts.en:
Raymond stays at the coastal town of Mombasa, Kenya. He is single and was introduced to Milango by a friend. There has been a rise in demand for building materials in the coastal region, and this is what prompted Raymond to set up such a business.
 
He has faced challenges including lack of reliable transport. Raymond decided to purchase a secondhand pickup and has applied for Ksh 80,000 in order to get funds to complete the outstanding balance of the cost of the pickup.

He has also purchased a piece of land and a number of livestock, and believes that this loan will enable him to increase the number of his flock and build a house on his parcel of land.

loans.use: To pay the outstanding balance owed on his secondhand pickup.

loans.name: Recho

texts.en:
Recho is a mother of 4 adult children, except for the last born who is aged 16. She is herself aged 55 and has had 20 years in farming. She currently produces milk, tea and cabbages for the local market with the help of two farmhands.

Recho has made a loan request with Juhudi Kilimo amounting to 40,000 KES to buy a chuff cutter to ease the feeding of her dairy cows. She adds that the improvement of her milk output will go a long way in making the lives of her children better. She is also focusing on buying more land. 

She reiterates that small ownership of land limits many farmers, especially in growing feeds for the dairy business.

loans.use: To purchase a chuff cutter.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: Delia, de 49 años de edad, es una mujer muy amable, trabajadora  y emprendedora, vive en compañía de su esposo y sus tres hijos en su casa propia. La actividad que realiza Delia es la preparación de tortas, pasteles y la venta de golosinas, para lo cual cuenta con un puesto de ventas ubicando dentro de un jardín de niños cercano a su casa. Es así que ella atiende muy amablemente a los niños, que son sus principales clientes a los que quiere bastante como si fueran sus propios hijos. Tiene seis meses dedicándose a esta actividad, y hasta el momento su esposo la acompañado y apoyado en su trabajo. Tanto en la preparación de los pasteles, como atendiendo al público. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le permite tener un ingreso económico, con el cual poder pagar los gastos de su hogar, además "El hacer pasteles ha logrado que mis hijos se mantenga mas unidos ayudándome en la preparación" acota. Esta actividad lo aprendió en los centros ocupacionales, se siente muy contenta de poder ser independiente y tener un ingreso propio, tiene planes de seguir creciendo y poder abrir otro puesto en otro jardín, en el cual vendería uno de sus hijos. Este sería el crédito número once con la institución MFP, se siente contenta de pertenecer a un grupo sólido y solidario. Con el crédito solicitado, lo invertirá en la compra de más golosinas, y una batidora para la preparación de los pasteles.
texts.en:
Delia, 49, is a kind, hardworking and enterprising woman living with her husband and three children in her own house.  Delia’s business is making cakes and pastries and selling snacks.  She has a food stand inside a Kindergarten near her house.  She kindly tends to the children who are her main customers; she loves them quite a bit as if they were her own children.  She’s been in business for six months and to date her husband has accompanied her and supported her work efforts both in the making of cakes and in tending to customers.

What she enjoys about her work is that it produces income to cover household expenses.  Besides, “making cakes has made it possible for my children to stay more together helping me to make them,” she states.

She learned these skills in occupational centers and she feels very happy to be able to be independent and earn her own income.  She has plans to continue growing and to open another stand at a different kindergarten which one of her children will tend to.

This would be loan #11 with MFP.  She feels happy to belong to a solid, mutually supportive group.  She will use the requested loan to buy more snacks and a mixer to use for the cake making.

loans.use: to buy a mixer and snacks to stock her stand.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael lives in Mombasa, a coastal town in Kenya. He is married and has one child aged 2 yrs. 8 months, and has been operating a clothes shop since 1999. He was introduced to Milango last year by his friend and has continued to access credit through his group. 

A loan of Ksh 70,000 will help Michael restock his shop with new clothes. He believes that with the Christmas festivities around the corner, he will make good sales over December and make savings for the education of his child next year.

loans.use: to buy a stock of new clothes.

loans.name: Exalashasman

texts.es: Exalashasman tiene una pulpería desde hace más 3 años, el arduo esfuerzo que realiza diariamente ha hecho que el ofrezca a su familia ingresos diariamente. Inicio esta actividad porque no tenía un trabajo estable y necesitaba proporcionar ingresos él tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. La mayoría de sus clientes recorren a su negocio por el buen servicio que ofrece. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, detergentes, sopas, enlatados y cremas.
texts.en: Exalashasman has had a grocery store for over three years.  The hard work he does daily has allowed him to earn family income every day.  He started the business because he did not have a steady job and needed to provide income for he has two children in his care.  Most of his customers come by the store because of the good service he provides.  The reason for the loan is to buy basic grains, snacks, detergent, soup, canned goods and creams.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana Maria,D. 20 años ella se dedica a la confeccion D. tejidos,como guipiles,edelantales,Cortes.desD. hace 4 años, ella nos cuenta que esta contentpa porque a la vez que es un medio que le ayuda a ella y a su familia le gusta mucho su trabajo,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. materia prima para la confeccion D. tejidos, ya que esta consiente D. que le falta capital para trabajar,el sueño D. ella es confeccionar tejidos en cantidades grandes y venderlos por mayor.
texts.en: Ana Maria, 20 years old, makes a living in the production of fabrics, like blouses, aprons, and skirts. For 4 years, she tells us that she is happy because while it is a means for her to help her family, she likes her work very much. That is why she is requesting this loan, for the purchase of raw material for weaving. She is aware that she lacks the capital to work. Her dream is to produce fabrics in large quantities and increase sales.

loans.use: To buy raw materials for weaving blouses, aprons,etc.

loans.name: Nazario

texts.es:
Nazario sigue participando en el banco comunal “San Isidro de Compone” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Nazario sigue con el negocio de venta de madera y también con el servicio de transporte. Nazario con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios y por ese motivo desea otro préstamo pues le ayuda mucho con el capital del negocio. 

En esta oportunidad Nazario requiere el préstamo para comprar madera. 

Nazario se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en: Nazario continues participating with Asociación Arariwa’s micro finance unit’s “San Isidro de Campone” communal bank in the city of Cusco.  Nazario is still in the business of selling lumber and also with the transportation service.  Nazario did very well with his previous loan and obtained good results so is now asking for another loan because it’s very helpful for his business’ capital.  On this occasion Nazario needs the loan to buy lumber.  Nazario is grateful for the opportunity presented to him by this means and commits to make his installment payments according to the payment timeline.

loans.use: To buy lumber.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is in the process of starting her employment agency business that seeks to diversify the workforce. After she was laid off from her job at a hedge fund, she had accumulated enough savings to take some time off to decide which path to take next. She has a passion for helping youth minorities find their way in the workforce and sees that there is a huge opportunity to help qualified minorities find employment by helping them with their search. Since Nancy doesn’t have a second job, she has plenty of time to work on getting her business off the ground.

Nancy will use this loan from Accion USA to develop her business website. She is currently searching for graphic designers who can meet her needs.

loans.use: to pay for the development of her website.

loans.name: Diappo Moy Doole N° 1 Group

texts.fr: Diappo Moy Doolé N°1 est un groupe mixte composé de trois femmes et de deux hommes.Les membres du groupe pratiquent tous le commerce de produits ménagers.Les femmes vendent à domiccile alors que les deux hommes font  du "porte à porte" pour écouler leurs marchandises.Leurs activités générent des revenus assez important leur permettant de prendre en charge leurs besoins et de participer aux dépenses familiales.Le chef du groupe ( doigt pointé)est une femme mariée , mère de quatres enfants qui sont tous à l'école.Elle paie leurs frais de scolarité ainsi que leurs fournitures et s'occupe aussi de leurs habillement.Pour augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe sollicitent un pret de 250000f pour acheter des produits ménagers.Leur ambition est d'ouvrir chacun sa propre boutique.
texts.en:
Diappo Moy Doolé N°1 is a mixed group made up of three women and two men. All the members of the group sell household products. The women sell from home while the men go door to door to sell their goods. Their activity generates quite a good income allowing them to provide for their needs and to take part in the family expenses.

The leader of the group (with the pointed finger) is a married woman, mother of four children all attending school. She pays for their school fees as well as their school supplies and takes care of their clothing.

To increase their working capital, the members of the group are requesting a loan for 250,000 Francs to purchase household products. Their ambition is for each to open their own shop.

loans.use: buy household products.

loans.name: Isabel Benita

texts.es: Isabel Benita se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos, desde hace más de 6 años. Ella es una personas muy emprendedora las ventas de sus productos las realiza en su vivienda, en donde la mayoría de sus clientes siempre le están solicitando variedad. El financiamiento lo utilizara para la compra de cuajada, leche, crema, queso y leche agria. Ella sueña con seguir contando con este financiamiento que le ha brindado la ayuda necesaria para seguir invirtiendo en su actividad.
texts.en: Isabel Benita sells dairy products; she’s been in business for over 6 years. She is a very enterprising person; she sells her products at home where most of her customers are always asking her for variety.  She will use the loan to buy curd, milk, cream, cheese and sour milk.  She dreams with continuing to have this financing which has been so helpful for her to continue investing in her business.

loans.use: to buy curd, milk, cream, cheese and sour milk.

loans.name: Hernando

texts.es:
A sus 44 años de edad Hernando es un hombre luchador que nunca se ha dejado vencer por las dificultades, ha trabajado incansablemente para sacar a su familia adelante, hoy en día divide su tiempo en 2 labores, en semana trabaja en la zona industrial de Sabaneta municipio de Antioquia, en unas ventas ambulantes donde vende tintos, cigarrillos y mecato en general y los martes, sábados y domingos vende en el parque principal de este municipio saca su trapiche para vender guarapo.

Con la idea de seguir progresando, Hernando quiere comprar insumos como caña, mecato y los recipientes adecuados para la preparación del guarapo, pero no cuenta con el capital para dichas compras, por lo que solicita un préstamo que le permita surtir su negocio, mejorar las ventas y proporcionalmente mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At his 44 years of age, Hernando is a fighter who has never allowed himself to be overcome by his difficulties; he has worked tirelessly to move his family forward. Nowadays, he divides his time between two tasks: during the week he works in itinerant sales in the industrial area of Sabaneta municipality in the department of Antioquia, where he sells coffee, cigarettes and general snacks and on Tuesdays, Saturdays and Sundays, he sells in the main park of this municipality, taking his sugar cane mill to sell guarapo (a drink made of sugar cane juice).

With the goal of continuing to progress, Hernando wants to buy supplies such as sugar cane, snacks and sufficient containers for the preparation of guarapo, however  he lacks sufficient capital for said purchases. Consequently, he is requesting a loan that would allow him to stock his business, improve his sales and, accordingly, improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to repair his sugar cane mill and buy a variety of supplies for his business.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Nilda; es conviviente; la socia tiene 31años de edad; la socia tiene 3 hijos, la socia sigue teniendo una tienda de abarrotes,ella sigue vendiendo productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y fideos,la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz,azucar,fideos y galletas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Nilda, 31, has a spouse and three children.  She continues running her grocery store selling basic staple items like sugar, rice, milk and noodles.  She works from 6am until 10pm and is able to support her children with this business.  She wants to expand the grocery store and is asking for a loan to buy rice, sugar, noodles and cookies at wholesale.  She is happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy staple merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Luisa Eloysaa

texts.es: Lusia Eloysaa se dedica una pulpería desde hace más 33 años, lo inicio con una pequeña venta de ciertos productos, a pesar de no tener muchos productos que ofrecer a sus clientes ella ha logrado salir adelante y mejorar su actividad económica. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, detergentes, sopas, enlatados, papel higiénico y sopas.
texts.en: Luisa Eloysa has been running a grocery store for more than 33 years.  She started it with the sale of just a few products.  Despite not having lots of products to offer her customers she’s managed to get ahead and improve her business.  The purpose of the loan is to buy basic grains, snacks, detergent, soup, canned goods and toilet paper.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Nadine

texts.es: Nadine, de 35 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora y dinámica, esta separada de su esposo, pero vive con sus padres, en compañía de su hijo, su hermano, y su prima. El trabajo que realiza Nadine es la venta de comidas al paso, para lo cual logró ambientar un espacio en su casa. colocando mesas, sillas y viendo que la zona donde esta es bastante transitada, decidió por empezar este negocio hace diez años. Actualmente tiene mucha clientela, y su hermano y su tía, son quienes más la ayudan atendiendo al público. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que logra tener un ingreso económico que le permite poder solventar los gastos de su hogar y poder dar un educación a su hijo, al que quiere mucho. Sin embargo el precio de los insumos para la preparación de su comidas cada vez están más caro, pero a pesar de esto, considera rentable este negocio. Este sería el crédito número cinco con la institución MFP, y comenta que se siente muy bien y cómoda con el grupo del banco comunal, ya que considera que son personas responsables y amables, que se preocupan por estar puntuales en sus pagos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará cerveza al por mayor, mesas para el local, terminar los acabos de los servicios higiénicos para ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Nadine, 35, is an enterprising, dynamic woman.  She’s separated from her husband but lives with her parents, her son, her brother and her cousin.  Nadine’s business consists in selling fast food; she equipped a space in her house to do so setting up tables and chairs.  Seeing that this is an area with quite a bit of foot traffic she decided to open the business ten years ago.  She currently has quite a large clientele.  Her brother and her aunt are the ones that help the most with tending to the public.  What she enjoys the most about her work is that she earns income that allows her to cover household expenses and provide an education for her son who she loves very much.  However, the price of ingredients for her meal preparation is more expensive very day.  Despite this she still considers this business to be profitable.

This would be loan #5 with MFP.  She comments that she feels comfortable and very good in her communal bank because she considers the members to be responsible, kind people who try their best to be punctual with their payments.   She will use the requested amount to buy beer at wholesale, tables for the locale and to finish furnishing the restroom to offer better customer service.

loans.use: to buy tables, cases of beer and to equip the restroom.

loans.name: María Manuela

texts.es:
María tiene 52 años de edad, es viuda y vive en Machachi con sus dos hijas de 21 y 16 años de edad. María es una persona de caracter fuerte, responsable y muy trabajadora, esto le ayuda a que día a día se supere más y enseñar a sus hijas a ser responsables.

María trabaja con su hija mayor en la venta de leche, empezó a trabajar con dos vacas, ahora tiene 5 vacas; el préstamo que solicitó actualmente es para la compra de una ternera para en un futuro incrementar la producción de leche y poder aumentar sus ventas que le generará ingresos y podrá darles el estudio a sus hijas.

Su sueño es tener más vacas para también dedicarse a la venta de las mismas y poder comprar un terreno donde pasten tranquilamente sus animales.
texts.en:
María, 52, is a widow living in Machachi with her two daughters who are 21 and 16 years old.  María is a strong-willed, responsible and very hardworking person.  This helps her to improve daily and to teach her daughters to be responsible.

María works selling milk with her eldest daughter.  She started out with just two cows and now she has five.  The loan she’s asking for now at present is to buy a calf so increase milk production in the future in order to increase sales that will generate income to provide schooling for her daughters.   Her dream is to own more cows to also go into livestock sales and to be able to buy a piece of land where they can go to pasture peacefully.

loans.use: to buy a calf.

loans.name: Rosa Alpina

texts.es: Rosa Alpina se dedica a la venta de ropa hace más de 3 que posee este negocio. Este no es el primer financiamiento que realiza pues han sido de gran ayuda los que ha realizado para su negocio. Rosa tiene 1 hijo de cuatro años a su cargo, ella ofrece sus productos de manera ambulante y en su vivienda pues ciertos clientes conocen la buena calidad que ofrece en productos. Sueña con terminar de realizar un cuarto en su vivienda para su hija. El motivo del crédito es para la compra pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes y ropa para niños.
texts.en: Rosa Alpina has been selling clothes for more than 3 years.  This is not her first loan for they have been of great use for her business.  Rosa has a 4-year-old son in her care.  She is a street vendor and also sells her wares at home because her customers know the good quality of products she offers.  She dreams with finishing a bedroom for her child.  The reason for the loan is to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits and children’s clothes.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es: La socia actualmente tiene 39 años de edad; las edades de sus hijos son 23, 14, 7 años de edad; la socia ahora abrio un salon de belleza, ella alterna las dos actividades que tiene y desea invertir el credito en la compra de maíz amarillo una parte para hacer jora y la otra en la compra de articulos para el salon de belleza, la socia también en su espacio determinara un area para poner articulos de bazar como adornos, peluches, papel de regalo y otros. La socia principalmente desea invertir el prestamo en la compra de maíz amarilo y en la compra de articulos para el salon de belleza.
texts.en:
The member is currently 39 years old; her children are 23, 14, and 7.

Gladis now has opened a beauty salon.  She alternates her two jobs and wants to use one part of the loan to buy yellow corn to make "jora" [fermented corn], and the other part to buy supplies for her beauty salon.  She also will choose an area in her space to put miscellaneous goods like decorations, stuffed animals, wrapping paper, and other things.

She wants to use the loan primarily to buy yellow corn and merchandise for her beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy yellow corn and merchandise for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Maria Consuelo

texts.es:
Maria Consuelo sigue participando en el banco comunal “San Isidro de Compone” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Maria Consuelo sigue con el negocio de venta de leche y también con la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo gallinas, pollos, cuyes y chanchos. Maria Consuelo con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios y por ese motivo desea otro préstamo pues le ayuda mucho con el capital del negocio. 

En esta oportunidad Maria Consuelo requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como cuyes y gallinas. 

Maria Consuelo se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Maria Consuelo continues being a member of Asociación Arariwa's 'San Isidro de Compone' community bank, which is located in the city of Cusco.  She continues in her business selling milk and raising animals such as hens, chickens, guinea pigs and pigs.  She did well with her previous loan and made good profits.  For this reason, she would like another loan as it helps her a lot with her working capital.  

On this occasion, Maria Consuelo needs a loan to buy animals such as guinea pigs and hens.

Maria Consuelo is grateful for the opportunity that she is being given and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy animals such as guinea pigs and hens

loans.name: Nicasio Arcenio

texts.es: Nicasio Arcenio inicio este negocio hace 7 años, su mayor desafío es el no tener el capital suficiente para la compra de madera y realizar sus trabajos. El empieza su actividad desde las siete de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde algunas veces le realizan una gran variedad de pedidos. El motivo del crédito es para la compra madera, pega, clavos, maque, junco, herramientas entre otros.
texts.en: Nicasio Arsenio started this business seven years ago.  His greatest challenge is not having sufficient capital to buy lumber to do his jobs.  His activity starts at 7am and continues until 6pm.  Sometimes he has quite a number of pending orders.  The reason for the loan is to buy lumber, glue, nails, varnish, reeds and tools, among others.

loans.use: to buy lumber, glue, nails, varnish, reeds and tools, among others.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia, de 52 años de edad, es una mujer muy amable, cariñosa y emprendedora, es casada, vive en compañía de su esposo, sus dos hijos, además de su nuera y sus tres nietos. Se siente contenta de poder estar cerca de sus nietos a quienes quiere mucho y engríe. La actividad que realiza Antonia es la venta de abarrotes de primera necesidad, para  esto abrió una bodega que esta ubicada en un terreno de su propiedad en un caserío llamado Puerto Liberal, que se encuentra surcando el río Ucayali. Se dedica a esta actividad desde hace cinco años, tiempo en el cual le ha valido para hacerse conocida en la zona, contando con la ayuda de su esposo quien atiende en esta bodega cuando ella esta realizando las compras en la ciudad. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo, es que le permite tener un ingreso económico con el cual pueda solventar los gastos de su familia, así como el poder realizar viajes cortos conociendo más lugares, estando con contacto con la naturaleza, además añade que las personas son muy buenas y amables. Por ahora su plan es seguir creciendo y ampliar su negocio, y comprar variedad de productos en mayor volumen. Este sería el crédito número once con la institución MFP, se siente muy contenta con el apoyo que viene recibiendo por parte de ustedes, por tanto se compromete en ser puntual con sus pagos. Con el crédito solicitado, comprará más productos para abastecer su negocio y así tener mejores márgenes de ganancias.
texts.en:
Antonia, 52, is a kind, affectionate and enterprising woman.  She’s married and lives with her husband and two children and also with her daughter-in-law and her three grandchildren.  She feels happy to be able to be near her grandchildren who she loves very much and encourages.  

Antonia’s business is grocery sales.  She opened a store located on a piece of property she owns in a hamlet called Puerto Liberal which is found on the banks of the Ucayali River.  She’s been in this line of work for five years which has been time enough for her to become very well known in the area.  Her husband helps her take care of the store when she’s off shopping in the city.  

What she enjoys about her work is having a source of income to cover family expenses as well as taking short trips to get to know other places being in touch with nature; she also adds that the people are very good and kind.  For now, her plan is to continue growing and expanding the business and to buy a large variety of products in larger amounts.

This would be loan #11 with MFP.  She feels very happy with the support she’s been getting from you so commits to be very punctual with her payments.  She will use the requested loan to buy more products to stock her store and thus have a better profit margin.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es: La socia actualmente tiene 57 años de edad, su hijo tiene 40 años de edad; La socia aún se dedica a la preparación de comidas caceras, la socia desea comprar insumos, ella invertira el credito en la compra de ingredientes, comprara arroz, al por mayor, azucar, fideos, aceite en bidones. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus comidas caceras.
texts.en: The borrower is currently 57 years old; her son is 40 years old.  She still works preparing home-cooked meals.  She wants to buy ingredients and will use the loan to buy them.  She will buy rice at wholesale, sugar, noodles and oil in large jugs.  She’s asking for the loan to buy ingredients to make her home-cooked meals.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food preparation.

loans.name: Tiburcia

texts.es: La socia actualmente tiene 42 años; la socia tiene 6 hijos  de los cuales 3 de ellos son mayore sde edad, y a tres de ellos la socia les apoya, la socia se dedica a la compra y venta de carnes, ella se dedcia  a la crianza de ganados, la socia invertira el credito en la compra de vacas tiernas para la crianza y la venta, ella también compra carne de cordero para la venta de  la carne. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de carne.
texts.en: The borrower is currently 42 years old and has six children; three of them are adults and three that are still in her care.  She is a meat merchant and raises livestock.  She will use the loan to buy young heifers to raise and sell; she will also buy lamb meat to sell.  She’s requesting the loan to buy meat.

loans.use: to buy young heifers to raise and lamb meat to sell.

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es: Luis Manuel se dedica a la venta de leña y cerdos, hace más de 5 años que tiene este negocio, lo inicio por la necesidad de sufragar los ingresos de su hogar. El tiempo que pasa con esta actividad es elemental para obtener ingresos. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de leña y cerdos pues tiene ciertas ofertas muy buenas. Sueña con terminar de realizarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en: Luis Manuel sells firewood and pigs; he’s had this business for more than five years.  He started it because he needed to earn income to cover household expenses.  The time he spends at this job is essential to earn income.  The reason for the loan is to buy firewood and pigs because he has some very good offers.  He dreams with finishing some home improvements.

loans.use: to buy firewood and pigs.

loans.name: Duo Guadalupe Group

texts.es:
DUO GUADALUPE
El grupo está integrado por dos señoras  quienes son Tiburcia  necesita otro crédito para invertir en sus ventas de helados y Frutas Con el credito quiere compra frutas  para elavorar elados donde vive porque en el  mes de septiembre ellos celebran  su Feria Patronal de su Aldea de Vista hermosa  ella  tiene ubicado  su negocio  en el cetro de donde realizan todas las actividades alusivas a la  feria y ella quiere aprovechar invirtiendo en mas  frutas para así mismo poder generar más ingresos en la misma  su deseo es seguir  vendiendo  y así poder  ser una ayuda para su esposo en los gastos cotidianos y sacar adelante a sus hijos, la señora Jesús necesita el crédito igualmente para poder invertir  en la venta de  frutas que tiene ubicada  en la ciudad capital   y así mismo poder surtir  en sus frutas de temporada  su deseo de ella seguir superando para sacar adelante a sus hijos que aun tiene estudiando. Las señoras agradecen a fape por el gran apoyo y ayuda que les ha brindado.
texts.en:
The group Duo Guadalupe is composed of two women, Tiburcia and Jesús. 

Tiburcia needs another loan to invest in her business selling ice cream and fruit. She wants to use the funds to buy fruit to make ice cream. She lives in Aldea Vista Hermosa and they celebrate their village's patron saint's day in September. Her business is located in the village center where they hold all the festival activities. She wants to take advantage of this and buy more fruit, in order to generate higher income. 

Tiburcia's goal is to continue in sales so that she can help her husband with daily expenses and give her children a good start in life. 

Jesús, the second woman in the group, also needs the loan to invest in her business selling fruit, which is located in the city capital. The funds will allow her to stock seasonal fruits. 

Jesús' goal is continue succeeding, so that her children, who are still in school, will get a good start in life. 

Both women are appreciative to FAPE for the great support and assistance which has been offered to them.

loans.use: to buy fruit at wholesale to make fruit ice cream.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: María Rosario

texts.es:
María tiene 52 años, es viuda y tiene tres hijas, vive con una hija de 22 años en Machachi. María se describe como una persona muy tranquila y muy responsable con su trabajo.

María trabaja sola en la crianza de pollos blancos para su comercialización. Trabaja con Fodemi desde el año 2004, el actual crédito es para la compra de pollos blancos y para poder ampliar los galpones, que le ayudará a tener mayor número de pollos y no tendrá olestias por que esten estrechos sus animales. Una vez hecha la inversión María podrá tener una buena cantida de pollo y así poderlos criar lo cual podrá incrementar sus ventas e ingresos, que mejorará su calidad de vida.

Dentro de unos cinco años María quiere ser una distribuidora de grandes empresas.
texts.en:
María is 52 years old.  She is a widow and has three daughters.  She lives with her 22-year-old daughter in Machachi.  Maria describes herself as a very calm person who is responsible in her work.

María works alone raising white chickens to sell.  She has been working with Fodemi since 2004.  She is requesting her current loan to buy white chickens and to expand her chicken pens.  This will help her to have a larger number of chickens and not have problems due to her animals living in cramped conditions.  Once she makes her investment, María will have a large number of chickens and be able to raise them.  This will enable her to increase her sales and income.  This will improve her quality of life.

Within five years, María would like to be a wholesaler, selling to large companies.

loans.use: to buy white chickens to increase her business

loans.name: Association "dental 5" Group

texts.fr: Les cinq femmes , membres du groupement "Dental 5" sont commercantes de produits alimentaires et agricoles  notamment le mil, l'archide, la patte d'arachide, le haricot....Elles sont toutes mariées et ont des enfants qu'elles prennent en charge avec les revenus de leur commerce.Le chef du groupe ( doigt pointé), est mère de trois enfants. Elle prend en charge leurs frais de scolarité et d'habillement.Elle participe aussi aux dépenses d'alimentation de la famille.Le groupement sollicite un pret de 250000f pour acheter des sacs  mil, d'arachideet de haricot.Leur ambition est d'implanter des cantines devant leurs domiciles respectifs.
texts.en: These five women, the members of the Dental 5 Group, sell household and agricultural products, primarily millet, peanuts, peanut-butter, and beans.  They are all married and have children whom they care for using the profits from their businesses.  The leader of the group (pointing her finger) is married with three children.  She provides for their school fees and clothing needs.  She also contributes to the family food expenses.  The group is asking for a 250,000f loan in order to purchase sacks of millet, peanuts, and beans.  Their goal is to set up small canteens in each of their respective homes.

loans.use: to purchase sacs of millet, peanuts, and beans.

loans.name: Octavio

texts.es: Octavio de 57 años de edad, trabaja para la municipalidad como Operador de Maquinaria Pesada desde hace 5 años, es originario de Santo Domingo, donde habita su familia la cual esta conformada por  su esposa y 3 hijos, los 2 mayores ya estan casados y el menor estudiando la secundaria. Don Octavio de lunes a viernes pasa trabajando fuera de su casa y el fin de semana lo pasa junto a su familia; esta solicitando su 2do credito con el objetivo de continuar mejorando su vivienda, cambiando el techo de la cocina que se encuentra en mal estado pues con el credito anterior solo pudo cambiar una parte del techo de la sala. El mayor sueño que tienen es poder tener su vivienda bonita, con las mejores condiciones para que viva su familia.
texts.en: Octavio, 57, has been working for the municipality as a Heavy Machinery Operator for five years.  He is from Santo Domingo where he lives with his family, comprised of his wife and three children.  The eldest two are married and the youngest is in high school.  Don Octavio is away from home Monday through Friday and spends the weekends with his family.  He is requesting a second loan so he can continue making improvements to his home. He wants to change the roof over the kitchen since it is in disrepair.  He used the previous loan to repair the roof over the living room.  Octavio's dream is to have a nice home, with better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: To repair the roof of his home.

loans.name: Elvin Jose

texts.es: Elvin Jose de 30 años de edad es soltero, habita en casa de su mamá junto a su hija de 14 años que estudia la secundaria. Elvin trabaja para la municipalidad como Operario de Limpieza desde hace 10 años, esta solicitando su 3er credito para continuar mejorando su vivienda, repellando su cuarto y embaldozandolo. El mayor deseo de Elvin es poco a poco acondicionar la casa para brindarle a su hija las mejores condiciones posibles y que ella estudie hasta que llegue a ser una profesional que le sirva a su pais, pues el estudio es la mejor herencia que le puede dar.
texts.en: Elvin Jose, 30, is single and lives with his mother and 14-year-old daughter who is in middle school.  Elvin has worked for the municipality as a Cleaning Operator for ten years.  He is requesting a third loan to continue improving his home by putting up drywall and tiles.  His dream is to provide better living conditions for his daughter so she can complete her studies and become a professional who serves her country.  He feels an education is the best inheritance he can leave her.

loans.use: To put up drywall.

loans.name: Cinthia Carolina

texts.es:
Carolina sigue participando en el banco comunal “San Isidro de Compone” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Carolina sigue con el negocio de venta de granos secos y termino de estudiar la carrera profesional de Odontología, ella ahora está haciendo sus prácticas profesionales en la ciudad de Kepashato de la provincia de La Convención. 

Carolina con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios y por ese motivo desea otro préstamo pues le ayuda mucho. 

En esta oportunidad Carolina requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales odontológicos como amalgamas y otras cosas más. 

Carolina se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Carolina continues as a member of Asociación Arariwa's “San Isidro de Compone” community bank, in the city of Cusco.  She continues selling dried grains and has finished studying for her degree in dentistry.  She is now working as an apprentice in the town of Kepashato, in La Convención province.

Carolina's previous loan was very successful and made her good profits.  For this reason, she would like another loan as she finds them very helpful.

On this occasion, Carolina needs a loan to buy dental materials such as amalgams (fillings), etc.

Carolina is grateful for the opportunity that she is being given and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy dental materials such as amalgams (fillings), etc.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: María De Los Ángeles tiene su negocio que es una pulpería, desde hace 6 años tiene este negocio. Ella anteriormente tenía la venta de comida, fue con el paso del tiempo que ella decide establecer esta pulpería para ofrecer a sus clientes variedad en sus productos es por eso que solicita el crédito para la compra de granos básicos, golosinas, pan, galletas, sopas, papel higienico y enlatados.
texts.en: María De Los Ángeles has a grocery store business.  She has been in this business for six years.  She previously had a business selling food.  Over time, she decided to set up a grocery store so that she could offer her customers a variety of products.  She is requesting a loan to buy basic grains, candies, bread, cookies, soups, toilet paper and canned food.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, candies, bread, cookies, soups, toilet paper and canned food

loans.name: Edy Marleny

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN ESTRELLA DE OROPESA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Eddy Marleny; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de cerveza, ella tiene una tienda donde vende cerveza al por mayor, la socia también se dedica a elaborar panes, ella vende pan en Oropesa, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de cerveza y ampliar el negocio de venta y elaboración de pan. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cerveza y también para comprar insumos para hacer pan como mantequilla, harina, azúcar y manteca.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eddy Marleny is a member of the 'Virgen Estrella de Oropesa' community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Eddy Marleny is 40 years old, lives with her partner, and has four children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling beer.  She has a store where she sells beer wholesale.  She also makes bread.  She sells her bread in Oropesa.  Through these businesses, Eddy Marleny gets her children ahead in life.  She would like to expand and improve her beer sales business and expand her bread business.  She is requesting this loan to buy beer and also supplies for making bread such as butter, flour, sugar and fat.

Eddy Marleny is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy beer and supplies for making bread such as butter, flour, sugar and fat

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: Luis Alberto se dedica a la producción artesanal, desde hace 9 años. Empezó este negocio debido a la familia pues con mucho sacrificio han logrado salir adelante con la actividad. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de barro, ladrillos, pagar transporte para llevar sus productos. Uno de sus desafíos ha sido el fuerte invierno que se ha presentado pues esto impide la comercialización de sus productos hasta sus clientes.
texts.en: Luis Alberto has been hand-making products for nine years.  He started this business through his family and, with a lot of sacrifice, he has been able to get ahead in this business.  He is requesting this loan to buy clay and bricks, and to pay to transport his products.  One of his challenges has been the harsh winter which has prevented him from selling his products to his customers.

loans.use: to buy clay and bricks, and to pay to transport his products

loans.name: Diana Mayela

texts.es: Diana de 31 años de edad es soltera, habita en casa de su mamá junto a sus hermanos. Diana trabaja para la municipalidad como Auxiliar de registro desde hace 3 años . Esta solicitando  su 2do credito con el objetivo de mejora las condiciones de vida de su familia, comprando materiales para hacer una tapia que le permita tener su casa mas segura, pues actualmente la delincuencia esta creciendo en el barrio donde vive, y teme que cuando se va a su trabajo pueda meterse alguien a robar lo poco que tiene.  Su mayor sueño es poder brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Diana is 31 years old, she is single and she lives in her mother's house with her siblings. For the past 3 years, Diana has worked as a municipal registration assistant. She is applying for her second loan with the goal of improving her family's living conditions by purchasing materials to build a wall in order to make her house more secure. Delinquency is currently on the rise in the area in which she lives and she worries that somebody could break in and steal the few things that she owns while she is out at work. Her greatest dream is to be able to provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase materials.

loans.name: Eliana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN ESTRELLA DE OROPESA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Eliana; ella tiene 33 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales, la socia cría animales como chanchos y gallinas, la socia los animales los hace engordar y crecer y luego lo vende en el mercado de Oropesa, la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de crianza de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para refaccionar los criaderos de chanchos y gallinas.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eliana is a member of the 'Virgen Estrella de Oropesa' community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Eliana is 33 years old, married, and has four children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business raising animals such as pigs and hens.  She fattens her animals and then sells them in Oropesa market.  Through this business, she supports her children.  She would like to expand and improve her animal-raising business.  She is requesting this loan to refurbish her pig and hen pens.

Eliana is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to refurbish her pig and hen pens

loans.name: Eliezer

texts.es: Eliezer de 35 años de edad es casado, tiene un hijo. Eliezer trabaja para la Municipalidad desde hace 16 años, desempeñandose como policia municipal. Esta solicitando su 4to credito con el objetivo de terminar la construccion de los cuartos de su casa, pues con el credito anterior solamente logro iniciar este proyecto de construccion, ya que los materiales se elevaron de precio, y no ajusto con el dinero. Elizer esta muy agradecido con AFODENIC y KIVA, pues gracias a los financiamientos otorgados los cuales ha ido mejorando su vivienda le ha podido dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida, y dice que si no es por los creditos nunca tendria su casita como la tiene ahora.
texts.en: Eliezer is 35 years old and has a son. He has worked for the city for 16 years as a police officer. He is asking for his 4th loan with the objective of finishing construction of some rooms on his house. With the previous loan he was only able to start this construction project. The cost of materials went up, and the money wasn't enough. Eliezer is very grateful to AFODENIC and KIVA, because thanks to the loans he has improved his home and been able to give his family better living conditions. He says that without the loans, he never would have been able to have his house the way he has it now.

loans.use: to finish construction of some rooms.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN ESTRELLA DE OROPESA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nelly; ella tiene 31 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta y elaboración de panes, la socia vende en la plaza de armas de Oropesa, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta y elaboración de panes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para hacer pan como harina, manteca y aceite.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nelly is a member of the 'Virgen Estrella de Oropesa' community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Nelly is 31 years old, married, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business making and selling bread.  She sells her products in Oropesa town square.  She works from 8.00am to 9.00pm and, through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  Nelly would like to expand and improve her business making and selling bread.  She is requesting this loan to buy supplies for making bread such as flour, butter and oil.

Nelly is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making bread such as flour, butter and oil

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angelica sigue participando en el banco comunal “San Isidro de Compone” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Angelica sigue con el negocio de elaboración y venta de quesos. Angelica con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios y por ese motivo desea otro préstamo pues le ayuda mucho con el negocio. 

En esta oportunidad Angelica requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo leche y otras cosas más. 
 
Angelica se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Angelica continues participating in the San Isidro de Compone communal bank, part of Unidad Microfinanza Arariwa in the city of Cusco.  Angelica continues with her business making and selling cheese.  The first loan went well for her and she managed to get good profits and for this reason she wants another loan, since it helps her so much with the business.

This time Angelica needs the loan to buy supplies such as milk and other things.

Angelica is grateful for the opportunity offered by means of this loan and so she is committed to making the payments in accordance with the schedule.

loans.use: to buy supplies and molds for making cheese

loans.name: Jaqueline Esmilda

texts.es: Jaqueline Esmilda tiene una pulpería, desde hace más de 4 años. Ella aprendió este negocio por su mama quien le enseño este medio de vida. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado salir adelante a pesar de las dificultades de sobrellevar su vida como madre soltera. Ella solicita el financiamiento para la compra de granos básicos, fideos, papel higiénico, golosinas, refrescos, pan, sopas y enlatados. Ella desea crecer poco a poco con su negocio y ampliarse cada dia mas en su comarca.
texts.en:
Jaqueline Esmilda has a local store, which she's had for more than four years. She learned the business from her mother, who taught her this way of life. 

In spite of the difficulties of her life as a single mother, she has managed to stay afloat through great effort. 

She is asking for financing in order to buy dry grains, noodles, toilet paper, candy, soda, bread, soup and canned goods. She wants to grow her business little by little, and expand in her area every day.

loans.use: to buy dry grains, noodles, toilet paper, candy, soda, bread, soup and canned goods.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase household goods such as cooking utensils, bowls, and buckets.

loans.name: Medi Flavia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN ESTRELLA DE OROPESA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Medi Flavia; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de panadería, ella alquila un horno donde elabora diferentes tipos de panes y luego lo vende en la plaza de Oropesa, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de panadería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como harina, leña, manteca y aceite para preparar pan.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Medi Flavia is a member of the Communal Bank “Virgen Estrella de Oropesa” which is located in the District, Province, and Department of Cusco.

She is 37 years old, married, and has two children. Medi Flavia divides her time between her daily activities and her bakery business. She rents an oven for making different types of bread and then sells her products at the plaza in Oropesa. Medi Flavia works from 8am to 5pm. Through her work she is able to help her children move forward. Medi Flavia wants to expand her bakery, so she is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as flour, firewood, butter, and oil for preparing bread.

She is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy flour, firewood, butter, and oil.

loans.name: Modesta Del Socorro

texts.es: Modesta Del Socorro tiene su trabajo que es enfermera en un hospital. Ella solicita este crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como bloques, arena, cemento y piedrín. Ella no había podido realizar estas mejoras a su vivienda porque tenía que sufragar los gastos del hogar. Sueña con mejorar cada día y poder obtener el financiamiento que será utilizado para las mejoras necesarias.
texts.en: Modesta del Socorro has a job as a nurse at a hospital.  She is requesting this loan in order to buy construction materials such as blocks, sand, cement, and gravel.  Modesta is not able to make improvements to her home because she has to cover the household expenses.  She dreams of getting better each day and having this loan will help her make the necessary improvements.

loans.use: to buy blocks, sand, cement, and gravel for making home improvements.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma sigue participando en el banco comunal “San Isidro de Compone” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Norma sigue con el negocio de la ganadería. Norma con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios y por ese motivo desea otro préstamo pues le ayuda mucho con el negocio. 

En esta oportunidad Norma requiere el préstamo para comprar vacas lecheras. 
 
Norma se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Norma continues to participate in the Communal Bank “San Isidro de Compone”, which is part of the microfinance organization Asociación Arariwa, in the city of Cusco. She continues with her livestock business. Norma did very well with her previous loan and was able to obtain good benefits. For this reason, she wants another loan to help with her business.

Norma is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy dairy cows. She is grateful for the opportunity that has been provided and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy dairy cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ganilla, thioub and bazin fabrics

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN ESTRELLA DE OROPESA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ubaldina; ella tiene 44 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chicha que es una bebida a base de maíz y también se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales como chanchos y gallinas, los animales los lleva a lugares como Saylla que queda a 20 minutos de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de chicha y negocio de crianza de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz y jora para preparar chicha y también para comprar animales como chanchos y gallinas.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ubaldina belongs to the communal bank "Virgen Estrella de Oropesa."  This bank is located in the Cusco district, which is in the province and department of Cusco.

Ubaldina is 44 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She alternates her daily activities with her "chicha" business.  Chicha is a beverage made from a base of corn.  Ubaldina also raises animals such pigs and chickens.  She takes her animals to places like Saylla, located 20 minutes from the city of Cusco.  She wants to improve and expand her business selling chicha and her animal husbandry business.  She requests a loan to buy corn and yellow maize to prepare the chicha, and also to buy animals such as pigs and hens.

Ubaldina is pleased to have this loan, and she promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy corn and yellow maize to make chicha, and also to buy animals such as pigs and hens

loans.name: Yeni

texts.es:
Yeni sigue participando en el banco comunal “San Isidro de Compone” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Yeni sigue con el negocio de la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas. Yeni con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios y por ese motivo desea otro préstamo pues le ayuda mucho con el negocio. 

En esta oportunidad Yeni requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes y gallinas. 
 
Yeni se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Yeni continues to participate in the Communal Bank “San Isidro de Compone”, which is part of the microfinance organization Asociación Arariwa, in the city of Cusco.
