She continues with her business of raising small animals, such as guinea pigs and chickens. Yeni did very well with her previous loan and was able to obtain good benefits. For this reason, she wants another loan to help with her business.

Yeni is taking this opportunity to request a loan to buy guinea pigs and chickens. She is grateful for the opportunity that has been provided and promises to complete her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Eudocia

texts.es: La socia tiene su chichería es un local en el cual vende principalmente la bebida tipica de los incas, la elaboración de la chicha es a base de maíz amarillo macerado, la socia desea invertit en la compra de maíz amarillo y en la elaboración de la chicha.
texts.en: This member has a shop where she sells mostly “chicha”, a traditional beverage of the Incas. Making “chicha” involves the use of ground yellow corn. She wants to invest in the purchase of yellow corn for making “chicha”.

loans.use: to buy yellow corn for making "chicha".

loans.name: Juana Evangelista

texts.es: Juana Evangelista tiene su negocio que es la venta de comida. Desde hace más de 24 años que tiene este negocio, ella es una persona que disfruta de obtener este medio de vida es por medio de el que ha podido sacar adelante a sus siete hijos que actualmente trabajan de manera independiente. Ella solicita este crédito para la compra de arroz, frijoles, aceite, cebollas, tomates, verduras, platos desechables, bolsas y otros productos.
texts.en:
Juana Evangelista has a business selling food. She has been in this business for more than 24 years. Juana is a person who enjoys earning her living in this manner because it has enabled her seven children to move forward. At the moment, they all work independently.

Juana is requesting a loan to buy rice, beans, oil, onions, tomatoes, vegetables, disposable plates, bags, and other products.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, onions, tomatoes, vegetables, disposable plates, bags, and other products.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha, de 30 años de edad, es una mujer decidida, alegre y emprendedora. Convive con su pareja y sus dos menores hijos en su casa propia, inmuebke que lograron comprar con mucho esfuerzo. El trabajo que realiza Martha, es la venta de raspadilla (esencia de frutas con hielo), en un puesto ambulante ubicado al frente de un centro educativo. Por tal razón es muy concurrida, ya sea por transeúntes y colegiales. Tiene tres años dedicándose a esta actividad, y en el que cuenta con el apoyo de una chica para atender a la clientela. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le permite tener un ingreso económico que ayuda con los gastos del hogar, sin embargo, cuando el clima no es favorable, la venta disminuye. Pero no se desanima y le gusta lo que hace, porque sabe que será recompensado. Este seria el crédito número nueve con la institución MFP. Por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con el dinero solicitado, piensa mejorar su negocio, comprando una maquina para hacer raspadilla.
texts.en: Martha, 30 years of age, is a determined, happy and enterprising woman.  She lives with her spouse and her two minor children in her own home, a property that they managed to purchase through a lot of work.  Martha makes shaved ice confections (fruit essences with ice) in a mobile stand located in front of an educational center.  She gets a lot of traffic, from both passersby and students.  She has been doing this for three years and has a young lady helping her take care of the customers.  She likes her work because it gives her income that helps with the expenses of her home, however when the weather is not favorable her income decreases.  She does not despair and likes what she does and knows that she will be compensated.  This is her ninth loan with MFP and she is hoping for everyone's support.  With the loan money she plans to improve her business by purchasing a machine to make shaved ice.

loans.use: to purchase a ice shaving machine.

loans.name: Raimunda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS TRIUNFADORAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Raimunda;  La socia tiene 34 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia se dedica a la compra al por mayor de golosinas y a la venta minorista de las mismas, ella vende en una carreta en la esquina de la av. principal de Andahuaylillas cerca al mercado central. La socia en esta ocasión desea el crédito para invertir en la construcción de su vivienda, ella también compra palos y los vende en trozos como leña en su casa, la socia en esta ocasión desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para la construcción de su vivienda.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Sra. Raimunda is a member of the Communal Bank “Las Trinufadoras” (The Winners) which is located in the District of Andahuaylillas, Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 34 years old and in a common-law relationship. Raimunda buys candy in bulk and then sells at retail from a cart located on the corner of the main avenue of Andahuaylillas, which is near the central market. On this occasion, Raimunda wants a loan to invest in the construction of her home. She also wants to buy logs that she will sell individually as firewood for home use. Therefore she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of construction materials for her home.

Raimunda is grateful for this loan and promises to complete her payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for her home and firewood to sell.

loans.name: Señor De La Caña -Chupuro Group

texts.es: La Srta. Lizz de 22 años de edad conviviente ,tiene un hijo de  1 añito edad ,Liz es una  mujer alentadora, luchadora  por salir adelante   frente a las dificultades que se les presenta en el camino ,es una de las socias de la alcancía comunal Señor de la Caña .Se dedica  a la venta de anticuchos  y salchipapas  que queda ubicado al costado de la municipalidad en Chupuro .Solicitó el préstamo para poder comprar  un carro sanguchero  y así poder vender más y no hacer esperar  a sus clientes. Lizz desearía para el futuro  alquilar un local   donde pueda brindar  y preparar todo el día alimentos  como desayuno, almuerzo y cena. Lizz en la foto viste  un polo color negro, está ubicada al medio sentada a lado izquierdo de la socia que viste una chompa color blanco.
texts.en: Miss Liz is 22 years old, lives with her spouse and has a one year old child.  Liz is an encouraged person, fighting to get ahead of the difficulties that come her way.  She is a member of the community bank Señor de la Caña.  She sells meat skewers and sausage and french fry dishes in the outskirts of the municipality of Chupuro.  She is requesting the loan to be able to buy a sandwich cart, which will enable her to sell more and not make her customers wait.  In the future, Liz hopes to be able to rent a place where she can prepare food all day, meals such as breakfast, lunch and dinner.  In the picture Liz is the one with a black polo shirt, in the middle, seated to the left of the associate with the white sweater.

loans.use: to purchase a sandwich cart.

loans.name: Baye Niass

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune marié sans enfants.Il a arrété ses études depuis deux ans faute de moyens pour les prendre en charge.Il s'est alors lancé dans le commerce de cartes de recharge téléphonique, un secteur qui marche fort en ce moment. Ses revenus lui permettent de subvenir assez correctement à ses besoins et à ceux de son épouse. Pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, il sollicite un pret de 250000f pour acheter un stock de cartes orange, tigo et expresso.Son ambition est de s'implanter en pleine ville dans sa propre cantine.
texts.en: This borrower is a young married man who has no children. He abandoned his studies two years ago as he did not have the means to pay for them. He then launched himself into the sale of telephone recharge cards, a business sector which is currently performing well. His income enables him to provide reasonably for his and his wife's needs. In order to expand his business, he is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs so that he can buy a stock of Orange, Tigo and Expresso cards. His ambition is to be able to set up his own store in the centre of town.

loans.use: to buy a stock of Orange, Tigo and Expresso cards

loans.name: Selene

texts.es:
Selene sigue participando en el banco comunal “San Isidro de Compone” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Selene sigue con el negocio de la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas, ella también sigue con la venta de leche. Selene con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios y por ese motivo desea otro préstamo pues le ayuda mucho con el negocio. 

En esta oportunidad Selene requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes y gallinas. 
 
Selene se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Selene continues participating in the San Isidro de Compone communal bank, a member organization of Kiva field partner, Arariwa Microfinance, in the city of Cusco. She continues with her business raising small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. She also continues to sell milk.  Selene’s previous loan went very well and she was able to make a good profit. Consequently, she would like another loan since it would greatly help her business.

On this occasion, Selene requires a loan to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

Selene is grateful for the opportunity provided to her through this process and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Marlene Del Socorro

texts.es: Marlene es una mujer trabajadora ella brinda los servicios de conserje. Los esfuerzos que realiza constante por su familia es algo muy importante para ella. Actualmente está solicitando este crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como bloques, arena, cemento. A pesar de que no gana mucho quiere realizarle estas mejoras a su vivienda que son necesarias.
texts.en: Marlene is a hard-working woman who works as a caretaker.  The constant efforts that she makes on behalf of her family are very important to her.  She is currently requesting this loan to buy building materials such as blocks, sand and cement.  In spite of the fact that she doesn't earn very much, she would like to make these necessary improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy blocks, sand and cement

loans.name: Oumar

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié , père de quatre enfants dont les trois sont à l'école.Il exerce le commerce de produits alimentaires et tient une boutique devant son domicile ou il propose à ses clients des denrées de premières nécessité comme le riz, l'huile, des pommes de terre, des oignons...Il entretient sa famille avec les revenus tirés de son commerce.Il sollicite un pret de 250000f pour renforcer son fonds de commerce en achetabnt des sacs de riz, d'oignons, de pommes de terre et d'autres produits divers.Son ambition est d'élargir son activité et de devenir grossiste.
texts.en:
Oumar is married and the father of four children, out of whom three attend school. He sells food products, and has a store in front of his house, where he sells staples such as rice, oil, potatoes, onions, etc, to his customers.

He provides for his family thanks to the income generated by his business. He's seeking a loan of XOF 250'000 in order to bolster his working capital by buying sacks of rice, sacks of onions, sacks of potatoes, and other food staples.

He ambitions to expand his business and become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice, sacks of onions, sacks of potatoes, and other food staples

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
Bertha sigue participando en el banco comunal “San Isidro de Compone” de la Unidad de Micro finanzas Arariwa de la ciudad del Cusco. Bertha sigue con el servicio de transporte pero también sigue con el negocio de venta de frutas. Bertha con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios y por ese motivo desea otro préstamo pues le ayuda mucho con el negocio. 

En esta oportunidad Bertha requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas. 
 
Bertha se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Bertha continues as a member of Asociación Arariwa's 'San Isidro de Compone' community bank which is located in the city of Cusco.  She continues providing a transport service and also continues in her fruit sales business.  Her previous loan was very helpful and enabled her to make good profits.  For this reason, she is requesting another loan as she finds these loans to be very helpful for her business.

On this occasion, Bertha needs a loan to buy fruit.

Bertha is grateful for the opportunity that she is being given and pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy fruit

loans.name: Babacar

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié.Il est père de deux enfants et a aussi en charge son épouse et ses deux parents.Il exerce le métier de tailleur depuis prés de 10 ans.Il A ainsi pu acquérir une bonne clientèle qui lui est très fidèle.A l'approche de la fete du mouton ( Tabaski), il sollicite un pret de 300000f pour renforcer ses produits en achetant notamment des tissus, des garnitures et des fils.Son ambition est d'ouvrir un secon,d atelier de tailleur et d'embaucher des jeunes.
texts.en:
Babacar is married. He's the father of two children, and also has to support his wife and two parents. He's been a tailor for nearly ten years.

During this time, he managed to build a good and very faithful clientele. With Eid al-Adha feast (Tabaski) approaching, he's seeking a loan of XOF 300'000 in order to bolster his stock by buying fabrics, trimmings, and threads.

He ambitions to open a second tailoring workshop, and to hire young people.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, trimmings, and threads

loans.name: Judith Fabiola

texts.es: la  cliente Judith  es una clienta antigua ya esta en la tercera secuencia tiene 2 niñas de 9  y 12 años ella las educa y se encarga de su manutención sola, ya que su esposo se encuentra en el extranjero hace cinco años y no le manda pensiones para sus niñas la Sra. Judith tiene como actividad principal la venta de cosméticos y promotora de ventas de una importante empresa que ofrece sus productos por catalogo,  y como actividad secundaria esta la de salón de peinados, vive en la casa de los familiares del esposo por tal razón no paga alquiler ni anticrético la cliente no presento atrasos en sus anteriores créditos. También cabe recalcar que  la cliente vende en la zona de la 16 de julio los días domingos y  jueves, cosméticos, el dinero del crédito es para la compra al por mayor de cosméticos que se encuentran en promoción y así poder venderlos al precio original y tener un poco mas de ingresos, es una persona joven con ganas de superación agradecida por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Judith has been a customer for a long time and this is her third loan.  She has two daughters, aged 9 and 12, who she educates and provides for since her husband has been overseas for five years and doesn't send money to support the girls.  Judith's main business is selling cosmetics by promoting sales for an important company which offers products by catalogue.  Her second business is a beauty salon.  She lives with relatives of her husband so she doesn't have to pay rent or a mortgage.  She has never been delinquent on previous loans.  

On Sundays and Thursdays, she sells cosmetic products in the "16 de julio" neighborhood.  She plans to use the loan to buy wholesale cosmetics which are on sale, so she can sell at the original price and earn more income.  She is a young woman who wants very much to get ahead, and is very grateful for the support received.

loans.use: To buy wholesale .

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es: María es cliente de hace mucho  años, ella en principio se dedicaba a la venta de cosméticos por catalogo de una empresa muy conocida, pero hace dos años atrás esa actividad la realiza en menor escala, siendo ahora su actividad principal la repostería, ella prepara para la venta pan, queques  de plátano , naranja y pies de manzana o limón, comercializando por la zona y algunas pastelerías de la zona sur,  también realiza tortas a pedido para cumpleaños, ella es una persona joven al igual que su esposo, tienen dos hijos pequeños a los que cuida mientras trabaja preparando sus masitas, el esposo trabaja con movilidad en el un taxi trufis de la zona sur, con el dinero de crédito comprar un horno industrial y así mejorar su elaboración de tortas, el deseo de la Sra. María es el de tener su propia pastelería, ya que la señora demuestra muchas ganas de superarse, es muy trabajadora y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: María has been a client for many years. At first she worked selling cosmetics by catalog from a well-known company, but for two years has been doing that business on a smaller scale. Now her bakery is her main business. She makes and sells bread, banana and orange cakes and lemon and apple pies. She sells them in her area and also to several pastry shops further south. She also makes birthday cakes to order. María and her husband are both young. They have two small children and she takes care of them while she works making her pastries. Her husband works in transportation and drives a taxi in the south. With the money from this loan María will buy an industrial oven and thus increase her cake production. María's dream is to have her own pastry shop. She shows a strong desire to get ahead and is very hard-working. She is grateful to the institution for the support they have given her.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial oven.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy materials to expand the pigsty, pigs and feed.
